about_the_game:
~story~
20xx
A pandemic Breaks Out Due to A Mutated Virus!
The Whole World Is Filled With Fear and Anxiety.
In the midst of this, a device that can directly attack the virus
"ZURA" is developed, and a ray of hope shines on the world!
Can you defeat the virus and save the world――?

~Game Overview~
"Zurarararush!!!" is a twin-stick shooter that is easy and intuitive to play.
The player becomes a doctor wearing a micro-suit,
and wears ZURA (a wig) as a weapon, and defeats the mutated virus inside the body.

ZURA has many types, and by wearing them, you can shoot various bullets.
ZURA can be stacked, so by taking multiple types, your firepower will increase significantly.
ZURA has a limited number of bullets (hair volume), so they will run out eventually.
The point of the strategy is to keep taking ZURA and maintain your firepower.

There Are Currently Two Modes Available.
Arcade Mode Has 100 Levels Plus Some Extras.
Score attack has two types: 3 minutes and infinite.

In arcade mode, there is a simple story where the doctor defeats the virus and becomes a hero, with themes of lovers and parents and children.
You can collect DNA and power up like an RPG, so anyone can aim for the ending.

In score attack, you compete with people around the world for the highest score.
By defeating enemies within a certain time, you can continue your combo and increase your score.
ZURA acquisition is essential for maintaining the combo.

The Play Time Is Expected to Be 10 to 20 Hours.

short_description: Zurararush!!! is a twin-stick shooter that you can play easily! Wear a wig as a weapon and defeat the virus that mutated inside your body! Power up your character and wig and become stronger! Defeat a lot of enemies and feel good! It's an arcade-style casual game that you'll want to play every day.
